article.title: BAE Systems Awarded Navy Contract for Technical, Engineering and Management Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems Land and Armaments L.P. is being awarded a $22.3 million cost-plus-fixed-fee Navy contract for technical, engineering and management support services in support of the Assault Amphibious Vehicle family of vehicles. This contract contains options that if exercised will bring the contract value to $41.6 million.
